title: Medallion, 4th–5th century
medium:
Medium: S-spun, Z-twist linen. Wefts: Z-spun linen, Z-spun wool, S-spun wool.
Technique: slit tapestry with supplementary weft wrapping.
description: Roundel depicting Herculas wearing lion skin and carrying a club with Victory in the sky. Seated figure at the lower right is incomplete.

tombstone.epitaph:
Medallion, 4th–5th century.
4th–5th century. Medium: S-spun, Z-twist linen. Wefts: Z-spun linen, Z-spun wool, S-spun wool.
Technique: slit tapestry with supplementary weft wrapping.. Gift of John Pierpont Morgan. 1902-1-73.
